linux.str: This wizard will find games and mods installed on this computer that are supported by Desura. Please Note: This will update all found items to the latest version on Desura.

The wizard is now complete and all games and mods found on your computer that are supported by Desura have been added to your account.
If Desura was unable to find a game installed on your PC, you can manually add it by clicking the "Custom Install" button below.

WARNING: You are attempting to launch a Windows program. This relies on your system recognising the format and launching the appropriate tools (eg: WINE). If you do not, the application/game may not launch correctly or at all.
This warning can be disabled in Settings.

The item you tried to launch is 32 bit but it appears that you do not have 32 bit libs Installed.
Please see http://www.desura.com/groups/desura/linux for more information.
You have no Linux {1}games{0} in your account.
Doesn't warn you every time you launch a Windows executable.
Allows the system window manager to position the main form as opposed to Desura saving and restoring position and size.
Launch all games via this binary file
Append these args to all games when launching
Stops Desura creating a force update shortcut in the main menu
Desura can not find {0} which is required by {1}.
Do you want to continue the install?

windows.str: You have no windows {1}games{0} or {2}mods{0} in your account. You should run the {3}find games installed wizard{0} which will search your PC for games Desura supports.
Make all install folders writable by normal users
Due to game developers not being able to follow windows standards many games write to the install folder and crash if they cant. Warning: Disabling this might make some games not work
The system harddisk ({0}:\\) is low on free space and Desura will start having performance issues. You can move your Desura cache folder to a new disk to free up space.
The harddisk that Desura cache saves to ({0}:\\) is low on free space. It is recommended that you free up space for Desura to perfom correctly.
This wizard will find games installed on this computer that are supported by Desura. Please Note: This will update all found items to the latest version on Desura.

The wizard is now complete and all games found on your computer that are supported by Desura have been added to your account.
If Desura was unable to find a game installed on your PC, you can manually add it by clicking the "Custom Install" button below.

Are you sure you want to uninstall {0} from your computer? Once the process starts it cannot be cancelled.
Please select the MCF file you want to upload.
Failed to validate file to upload
Failed to find the file needed to resume the upload. Please locate this file or start again.
File doesn't match the uploaded file. Please select the correct file or start again.

Delete the file after the upload is complete
You can resume this upload at any time via the "games" tab which lists all projects you are developing and your current uploads.
Please select a folder that contains a clean install of your game.
Select the folder and Desura will zip its contents into a MCF archive for uploading.
There was an error during the MCF create process and it has been stopped.
There was an error during the install check process and it has been stopped.
has been found and is now ready to go.

was not found on your computer. Please ensure it is installed and you have run it at least once, then try again. Otherwise you can click the "custom install" button below and tell us where it is installed.

Desura has detected that {0} has already been installed. Since {0} requires a complex install, it is recommended that you uninstall {0} manually before continuing with the Desura install to avoid issues with content conflicts.

{0} is currently in the process of installing. In order to uninstall it Desura has to stop the installing process. Continue with uninstall?
If you close this form it will stop the current process. Are you sure you want to?

In order to install some items, Desura needs to know what steam account you use.
You can change this at any time by going into the options form.
Please Note: No one from Desura will ever ask you for your steam password.
Go into offline mode (no internet access)
Wizard to find games and mods installed on this PC
Set custom install paths for games
Shows a web page containing your games and their CD keys
Activate Game CD key or Gift
Enter a CD key or giftcode to activate a game on your account
Browse items in your shopping cart
Browse items that you have brought
Browse items that have been gifted to you
Check to see if the item is installed on this PC.

Before releasing new features and new builds of Desura a public beta is released to test and fix bugs in the new version. As a Desura user, you can opt in and help test the public beta's new features to aid in bug fixing and offer feedback.
If you participate and experience a crash, your crash dump will be automatically uploaded and you may be contacted via email to help debug and fix the bugs you encounter.
Please Note: Public beta's may contain bugs which could cause loss of data or application crashes. It is recommended that only advanced users participate in public beta's.
Please Note: If you select a new theme you will have to restart Desura to apply it.
Select the language you want to use
Save login information and auto login when Desura starts
Automatically upload crash reports when Desura starts (used for debugging)
This removes unneeded data from MCF's saving harddrive space. However this will cause more to be downloaded.
Saves your username for next time on login
Opens the console when errors occur
Stops Desura putting games into Windows Game Explorer
This is the number of workers used to perform processes (like create a MCF).
Unloads the mainform on close saving memory but at the cost of speed (and history).
Don't autoload browser pages on login
Doesn't load the browser pages on login leading to less memory (but slower load times).
Some settings that have been changed require a restart to take effect.
Don't show main window on AutoLogin
Please select a new folder for Desura to use as a cache
Enables chat in the Desura Client
By default make the chat client a seperate window
When Desura log's in, show the chat contact window (Note: Only if the chat client is a seperate window)
Always sets your current status to your status last time you where logged in
Please enter a valid path to each game, to save your changes.
Please enter a valid cache path, to save your changes.

Your settings have been updated. Because you updated your games list, you will need to run the {1}install wizard{0} to verify the paths you entered, for these games to be displayed on your {2}play page{0}.
Please enter a valid CDKey or gift code.
An error has occured activating your key. Please try again shortly.
If you have purchased a retail game or {1}received a gift{0}, to register it with Desura enter the CD/DVD key it was distributed with here:
Product keys, CDkeys and gift codes typically look like:{0}{0}AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCCC-DDDDD-EEEEE{0}0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUV{0}00000 11111111

If you have games already on your PC which you want Desura to find and list, you can run the {1}find games installed{0} wizard which will automatically add them to your account. If Desura doesn't find a game you have installed, you can manually specify the folder where you installed it below:

You can add shortcuts for other games and applications on your system by using the form below. You can add launch arguments via properties in the right click menu and also remove by selecting uninstall in the same menu. Warning: This feature is in Beta. Expect Bugs!
Please select the root folder for the game:
Please select the binary for the link:
There was an error validating your information:
Your email is blank or invalid
Your birth date is invalid, or you are too young.
Please fix these items and try again.
An error has occurred while trying to create your account.

We've sent you an email to verify your account. You should receive the email in the next few minutes. When you do, follow the instructions contained in the email to complete your registration and login to Desura.
Didn't Get the Email? - Be patient, sometimes it takes a while for the email to arrive - Make sure emails from support@desura.com are not blocked - Check your junk email box - Try registering again here or via www.desura.com - Contact us at support@desura.com if you still experience problems

Please enter your registration details below and click accept to proceed. Your email will be used to activate your account. If you have a MODDB or INDIEDB account you don't need to register again, you can login with it.
Please enter the email address you used to register with, and you will be sent an email which you can use to reset your password.
Reminder has been sent. Please check your email inbox for instructions on what to do next.
An error has occurred with the password reminder.
Please enter a valid email address.
